Articles.Content:
Been doin some things on duna and Ive noticed this white line thing. Very annoying and does not go away. Anyone know what this is??

http://imgur.com/dDIHFzU
I have always had them and they are everywhere, yes annoying but i believe its just the game engine doing its thing lol
Ok at least its not just me.

It's just a graphical glitch where two sections of map intersect.

 

It does make you feel like you want to stay away from it though, because kraken.

On 8.2.2016 at 9:48 PM, smjjames said:

It's just a graphical glitch where two sections of map intersect. ...

Same issue here, don`t worry.

On 8-2-2016 at 9:48 PM, smjjames said:

It's just a graphical glitch where two sections of map intersect.

 

It does make you feel like you want to stay away from it though, because kraken.

About a year ago somebody explained it all in a video. I believe it was one of the devs but I can be mistaking.
The game has two render modes; near and far. That line is a glitch where one meets the other. It is common and will not hurt your game. The same glitch can often be seen in parachute shadows. One moment you can clearly see all the cord, the next moment it's a solid shadow.
